resources.string: With this is app, you can train your math skills. It tells you random exercises, in an range you can set before you begin to solve the exercises. The number of exercises is also chosen before the test begins. Supported arithmetic operations are currently: addition.
Turn addition on/off for the exercises that will be randomly generated. (Not editable,because it is currently the only arithmetic operation supported.)

This is the biggest number that can show up in the following exercises. Please notice that this isn\'t the biggest solution that can show up (the biggest solution is two times bigger), so the overall maximum value is 10,000.
This number affects after how many exercises the training session stops. The absolute maximum value is set to 1,000, to pretend you from endless calculating exercises.
No, to edit the settings, you have to go back and edit them. Here you can only see them and start a training session, if you like the settings.
